additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Reconstituted Fruit Juices [Apple (94%), Orange (3.2%), Strawberry (0.5%), Mango (0.5%), Pineapple (0.5%), Raspberry (0.5%), Passionfruit (0.3%), Blackcurrant (0.1%)], Acidity Regulator (303), Colours (110, 102), Natural Flavours, Preservatives (202, 211, 223), Thickener (466).

description: Berri Quelch Tropical comes in 4 natural, delicious flavours. With No added sugar, no artificial colours or flavours it's the perfect treat on an Australian hot summer day.99% fruit juiceNo added sugar4 flavoursNo artificial flavoursNo artificial colours
name: Quelch Tropical Fruit Juice Icy Tubes 24 pack
